casebody.data:
Spencer BOWENS, petitioner,
v.
UNITED STATES. No. 18-6387. Supreme Court of the United States Nov. 19, 2018.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fourth Circuit denied.

Justice SOTOMAYOR, with whom Justice GINSBURG joins, dissenting from denial of certiorari: I dissent for the reasons set out in Brown v. United States, 586 U.S. ----, --- S.Ct. ----, --- L.Ed.2d ---- (2018) ( SOTOMAYOR, J., dissenting).
